title: Advice
content: I got into cse in ec campus today through PESSAT, my rank in Comedk is 2653 which might give me a chance for cse related branches in msrit or bms so if that happens should I stay with Pes or go to msrit?

comments.body:
Ehhh i would say stick with pes cse 
The management in msrit is pretty bad
And according to the students on that subreddit
Everything is going in a downwards spiral rn
Is Pes ec campus reputed enough? And are there any cons or downsides of it?

The campus which you studied wont be mentioned in the degree certificate you get nor the companies that come for hire
There arent much pros and cons between the two campus' imo except the location 
Search up pes ec vs rr in the search bar you should get a more detailed view
The two PES campuses are equivalent objectively. There is a detailed comparison on the FAQs: [https://bit.ly/pesu-faq](https://bit.ly/pesu-faq)
go to msrit or bms if u get cse
